short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically pull data from EHRs and referral management platforms to effortlessly create new referrals in ReferralPlus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ReferralCreate is the Chrome extension tailor-made for ReferralPlus subscribers, designed to make your referral management more efficient than ever. ReferralCreate does the heavy lifting so you don't have to. Here's how it enhances your workflow:

Automate Referrals from EHRs and Management Platforms: With just a click, you can extract predetermined data from Electronic Health Records (EHRs) and other referral management platforms to instantly create a new referral in ReferralPlus.
  
State-of-the-Art Security: We employ end-to-end encryption to guarantee that your data is safe every step of the way from the source to your ReferralPlus account.

Exclusive to ReferralPlus: This tool is a game-changer, offering a solution where direct integrations aren't available, making it a must-have for all ReferralPlus subscribers.

Free with Your Subscription: No additional costs! ReferralCreate is included as part of your existing ReferralPlus subscription.

Elevate your referral management with the unique and secure capabilities of ReferralCreate for ReferralPlus!
